mapper.select:
select pcd.category, pcd.project, pcd.part_name, pcd.material, pcd.mold_no, pcd.mold_temp, pcd.material_temp, pcd.jet_velocity, pcd.vp_switch, pcd.hold_pressure1, pcd.hold_pressure2, pcd.hold_pressure3, pcd.hold_pressure4, pcd.hold_pressure5, pcd.hold_pressure6, pcd.hold_time1, pcd.hold_time2, pcd.hold_time3, pcd.hold_time4, pcd.hold_time5, pcd.hold_time6, pcd.hold_pressure_velocity, pcd.platen_position, pcd.opening_speed, pcd.ejection_speed, pcd.cooling_time, pcd.clamping_force, pcd.passivation, srd.core_thickness, srd.core_thickness_range, srd.r1_vector_height, srd.r1_vector_height_range, srd.r2_vector_height, srd.r2_vector_height_range, srd.outer_diameter_ecc, srd.kanhe_ecc, srd.face_ecc, srd.annealing_process, srd.kanhe_roundness, srd.outer_diameter_average, srd.outer_diameter_range, srd.outer_diameter_roundness, srd.outer_diameter_shrinkage, srd.outer_diameter_roughness, srd.r1_flatness, srd.r2_flatness, srd.r1_split_average, srd.r2_split_average, srd.wft_stability, srd.wft_consistency, srd.wft_max_as, srd.wft_outer_diameter_shrinkage, srd.cft_r1, srd.cft_r2, srd.cft_consistency, srd.cft_max_as, srd.coating_trend, srd.cfsr_r1, srd.cfsr_r2, srd.cfsr_r1_r2, srd.burr, srd.weldline, srd.appearance_problem, srd.appearance_img, srd.remarks, sd.core_thickness_lens, sd.max_wall_thickness, sd.min_wall_thickness, sd.max_core_ratio, sd.max_min_ratio, sd.outer_diameter, sd.edge_thickness, sd.whole_min_wall_thickness, sd.whole_max_wall_thickness, sd.whole_max_min_ratio, sd.whole_diameter_thickness_ratio, sd.max_angle_r1, sd.max_angle_r2, sd.r1_r2_distance, sd.middle_part_thickness, sd.bottom_diameter_distance, sd.mechanism_diameter_thickness_ratio, sd.r1_kanhe_angle, sd.r1_kanhe_height, sd.r2_kanhe_angle, sd.r2_kanhe_height, sd.r1_srtm, sd.r2_srtm, sd.outer_diameter_srtm, sd.assembly_drawing from t_process_condition_data pcd inner join t_shaping_result_data srd on pcd.category = srd.category and pcd.project = srd.project and pcd.part_name = srd.part_name and pcd.material = srd.material inner join t_structure_data sd on pcd.category = sd.category and pcd.project = sd.project and pcd.part_name = sd.part_name and pcd.material = sd.material where 1=1
AND pcd.category like CONCAT('%',#{category},'%')
AND pcd.project like CONCAT('%',#{project},'%')
AND pcd.part_name like CONCAT('%',#{partName},'%')
AND pcd.material like CONCAT('%',#{material},'%')

select pcd.category, pcd.project, pcd.part_name, pcd.material, pcd.mold_no, pcd.mold_temp, pcd.material_temp, pcd.jet_velocity, pcd.vp_switch, pcd.hold_pressure1, pcd.hold_pressure2, pcd.hold_pressure3, pcd.hold_pressure4, pcd.hold_pressure5, pcd.hold_pressure6, pcd.hold_time1, pcd.hold_time2, pcd.hold_time3, pcd.hold_time4, pcd.hold_time5, pcd.hold_time6, pcd.hold_pressure_velocity, pcd.platen_position, pcd.opening_speed, pcd.ejection_speed, pcd.cooling_time, pcd.clamping_force, pcd.passivation, srd.core_thickness, srd.core_thickness_range, srd.r1_vector_height, srd.r1_vector_height_range, srd.r2_vector_height, srd.r2_vector_height_range, srd.outer_diameter_ecc, srd.kanhe_ecc, srd.face_ecc, srd.annealing_process, srd.kanhe_roundness, srd.outer_diameter_average, srd.outer_diameter_range, srd.outer_diameter_roundness, srd.outer_diameter_shrinkage, srd.outer_diameter_roughness, srd.r1_flatness, srd.r2_flatness, srd.r1_split_average, srd.r2_split_average, srd.wft_stability, srd.wft_consistency, srd.wft_max_as, srd.wft_outer_diameter_shrinkage, srd.cft_r1, srd.cft_r2, srd.cft_consistency, srd.cft_max_as, srd.coating_trend, srd.cfsr_r1, srd.cfsr_r2, srd.cfsr_r1_r2, srd.burr, srd.weldline, srd.appearance_problem, srd.appearance_img, srd.remarks, sd.core_thickness_lens, sd.max_wall_thickness, sd.min_wall_thickness, sd.max_core_ratio, sd.max_min_ratio, sd.outer_diameter, sd.edge_thickness, sd.whole_min_wall_thickness, sd.whole_max_wall_thickness, sd.whole_max_min_ratio, sd.whole_diameter_thickness_ratio, sd.max_angle_r1, sd.max_angle_r2, sd.r1_r2_distance, sd.middle_part_thickness, sd.bottom_diameter_distance, sd.mechanism_diameter_thickness_ratio, sd.r1_kanhe_angle, sd.r1_kanhe_height, sd.r2_kanhe_angle, sd.r2_kanhe_height, sd.r1_srtm, sd.r2_srtm, sd.outer_diameter_srtm, sd.assembly_drawing from t_process_condition_data pcd inner join t_shaping_result_data srd on pcd.category = srd.category and pcd.project = srd.project and pcd.part_name = srd.part_name and pcd.material = srd.material inner join t_structure_data sd on pcd.category = sd.category and pcd.project = sd.project and pcd.part_name = sd.part_name and pcd.material = sd.material where 1=1
AND pcd.category like CONCAT('%',#{category},'%')
AND pcd.project like CONCAT('%',#{project},'%')
AND pcd.part_name like CONCAT('%',#{partName},'%')
AND pcd.material like CONCAT('%',#{material},'%')
